entries.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: You can breathe air for up to 1 hour, after which you begin to suffocate.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 plus your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Leviathan Will
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened, charmed, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

entries.name: Observant & Athletic
entries: You have proficiency in the Athletics and Perception skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aquan.
